entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Antigonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 5:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: NNE 19 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain changing to rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating early in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
